snippet: Desmond Tutu, the retired Anglican archbishop, has been admitted to a Cape Town hospital for a persistent infection.
abstract: Retired South African archbishop Desmond Tutu is admitted to Cape Town hospital for treatment of a persistent infection.
lead_paragraph: Desmond Tutu, the retired Anglican archbishop, has been admitted to a Cape Town hospital for a persistent infection.

headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Tutu Is Hospitalized
